EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF/Data Workshop Brazil_Q215.Confirm W/ Header - Sao Paulo
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: Pivotal Big Data Roadshow São Paulo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME Tagline Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Big Data Roadshow <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/saopaulo> in São Paulo. Please find the event details below:
Date: May 21, 2015 Time: Registration begins @ 8:00AM / Data Keynote begins @ 9:15AM / Cloud Keynote begins @ 1:00PM Location: Maksoud Plaza <http://www.maksoud.com.br>, Alameda Campinas, 150, São Paulo, Brazil
{{my.Save the Date - Sao Paulo:default=edit me}}
To fully participate in the hands-on workshop, please bring your laptop with wireless connectivity enabled.
Questions? Please contact Paul Santos via email <mailto:psantos@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
